topic.title: ZeroNet on Mobile Devices
topic.body: Is this project already underway? If so can someone point me at a repo where I can contribute?

2_1J7dTw3ZsXUsXzpBqVWVj5aXRUMsMC6Nfc.body:
Got so many people to use Telegram, and now I regret it as Wire and Tox would be better (more privacy-respecting) options.

https://wire.com
http://tox.chat

1_18GMgG7f7mYquJC1RCphMRLhMX1wsxzxff.body: Nice, thanks @waterrabbit! I will write a blog post about the ZeroNet effort and see if that can attract more support for the project!

1_1H8x2Aeu28Lnj6vhXFNZ32kpvGS6dnqWGA.body:
> [planespherev3](#comment_53_1HYB4Pe6irbQgDbeKm1zeFD7M8pdbksFeS): What would be a must would be to have an instant vod system. Like youtube but integrated on zeronet and with data hosted on it. 
> Also, integrated tools to anonymize everybody a little more.

Have you seen ZeroTube? http://127.0.0.1:43110/1FUQPLXHimgCvYHH7v3bJXspJ7bMBUXcEb
